channel.title: Hindustan Times | Facebook RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an RSS feed of the three most recent posts at https://www.facebook.com/hindustantimes

item.title: #ItsViral | Journalist Aarti Tikoo Singh recently called out
item.description: #ItsViral | Journalist Aarti Tikoo Singh recently called out #Vistara for labelling all in-flight vegetarian meals as “Hindu meals” and chicken meals as “Muslim meals"

item.title: #ShraddhaKapoor is now moving into a new home close to co-st
item.description: #ShraddhaKapoor is now moving into a new home close to co-star #AkshayKumar’s house

item.title: #ItsViral | A #Vadodara man claims he lost three cars, inclu
item.description: #ItsViral | A #Vadodara man claims he lost three cars, including an #Audi, due to waterlogging after heavy rainfall in his neighbourhood.
